quiz.question: Damages that would not have taken place but for the breach and is out of pocket expenses. A party cannot receive both expectation and reliance damages, What is it?
What is not the element for a reliance claim? (ref 2)
answerOptions: The promisee takes detrimental action in relaince
Plaintiff confers a benefity on defendant in reliance
The promise would be reasonably expected to induce reliance
Enforcement of promise is the only way to avoid injuries
